summary: AN ORDINANCE partially implementing acceptance of an offer of Burlington Northern, Inc. to convey a portion of its former Fremont-Kenmore branch line right of way to The City of Seattle for general corporate purposes; authorizing in such connection modification of a tri-party agreement entered into by and between the City, the Port of Seattle and the Great Northern Railway Company, predecessor to Burlington Northern, Inc., dated February 11, 1969 (C.F. 263014); and authorizing and directing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation and the Corporation counsel to take certain steps toward implementation of such acceptance.
